source_sentence: 靈竺淨慈自得禪師錄卷第五
translation: Linzhu Jingci zide chanshi lu, vol. 5

source_sentence: 師初參見天童宏智禪師。
translation: The teacher first met with the meditation master Tiantong Hongzhi.
He asked, "How is this the wonderful taste on the tongue?
Zhi said, "This is the approach of ambrosia.
The teacher asked if he was still going in and out.
Zhi said it comes and goes without obstruction.
The teacher said, "Why is it in people's mouths?

source_sentence: 智曰見聞之妙超彼聲色。
translation: Zhi said the subtlety of seeing and hearing surpasses that of sound and form.
The teacher then paid homage.
Ji said, "Where did you leave recently?
The teacher said, "I don't know, monk.
Zhi said, "Let's talk here.
The monk then returned to his guest's seat.
Since then, he had relied on him for seventeen years.

source_sentence: 從天童至長蘆而請師主首座。
translation: He went from Tiantong to Changlu and asked the master to take the chief seat.
The people all disagreed with him.
The teacher then went to Jing Shan and met the monk.
He asked, "That toad at the bottom of the well swallowed the moon.
He didn't borrow the nighttime curtain at 3 o'clock.
What's the meaning?
He said, "Do you still understand it?
The master said.
'I'm the body that's born.'
I don't blame the monk for getting it.
He said, "I've seen the writer come in person.
The master then made obeisance.
He said, "Today is the first time I've met someone's poisonous hand.
The teacher then went to see Monk Hsien at Dahong.
He asked.

source_sentence: 從上諸聖未曾為人說著。
translation: "From up there, the sages have never taught anyone anything.
Monk, what did he do?
Hsien said, "Old monk, how was it again?
The teacher said, "How could this be?
Hsien said he might get attached to it.
The teacher said.
"If it's like this.
Would a student see that you have no part in this?
He said, "Why don't you sit down and have some tea?
The teacher said, "What kind of mind does it practice?
Hsien laughed loudly.
The teacher then made obeisance.
The teacher then went to see Monk Cong at the stone gate.
He asked him.
"After he attains unity of mind.
"What happened when he first got the opportunity to undertake it?
Cong said, "I've wasted away.
The teacher said.
"The monk has missed it.
"Did I miss the point?
Cong said, "Old monk, we've sinned.
The monk then paid homage to him.
Tsung said he didn't accept people's prostrations.
The teacher said, "What's the way?
Tsung then laughed and agreed.
The teacher then went to Yunju and met the monk Xi.

source_sentence: 問曰某甲兼聞和尚不會禪是也否。
translation: He asked, "Is it true that I've also heard that the monk doesn't know how to meditate?
He said yes.
The teacher said, "Why wouldn't he?
He was silent.
The teacher then returned to the monk's quarters and told him.
He sent an attendant to the west with a verse, saying.
"Yunju doesn't know how to meditate.
He washed his feet and went to bed to sleep.
He didn't realize his pillow had fallen.
It breaks through the permanently abiding pile.
When the teacher opened his eyes, he replied with a verse.
"The monk doesn't know Chan.
When he gets sleepy, he beats himself to sleep.
The mud cow eats the water and grass.
The wooden horse bites the tiles.
The attendant took the verse and presented it to Xi.
Xai asked what it was.
The attendant wanted to open his mouth.
Xai then struck it.
The attendant then suddenly had a great awakening.
The teacher heard it and said.
"It's a pity he let go of that painful blow.
The teacher then went to see Monk Zhao at Mount Jiang.
He asked him.
"There's no awakening dharma that's fully understood.
Why is there a transmission?
Shan said it was because there was no awakened Dharma.
The teacher said, "Where did it end up?
Shan said, "I went to eat tea.
The teacher said, "I still can't escape the difficulty of the gold ring.
The monastery then rested.
The teacher then made obeisance.
The teacher went to Fayun to see the monk Xian.
Sensei said, "Where did you come from?
The monk said he had come down from his feet.
Sensei said, "How many people are under his feet?
The monk made a gesture of treading water.
Sensei said, "I don't know even if I wasted away.
The teacher said, "It's true, it's true!
The teacher then went to Jiashan and met Monk Qin.
He asked him.

source_sentence: 和尚得臨濟佛法至今住此山。
translation: "Monk, you've attained Linji's Buddha-Dharma and have been staying on this mountain ever since.
How is this your own eyes?
He then shouted, and then he shouted.
The monk said, "I've been given a shout by the monk.
Mr. Qin said, "Who do you see here?
The teacher said, "The monk Tiantong Jue.
Mr. Qin said, "So, you don't think he's a writer?
The monk again made a harmonious noise and then he shouted.
He said.
"He's really a lion!
He can roar like a lion.
The teacher waved his sleeve and left.
The teacher then went to Xuefeng and met Monk Ru.
Ruo said, "Where did the visitor come from?
He said he'd come from Tiantong.
Ruo said, "What will he get?
The monk bowed his head and said, "Look!
Tathāgata said, "Have you figured it out?
The teacher said, "Lulu!
Ru slapped his palm and said, "The grass thief is a big loser.
The master said it's the old thief.

source_sentence: 如曰天童有何言句示徒。
translation: Ru said, "What words did Tiantong say to show his disciples?
The teacher said, "What did the monk say?
Ru said, "The thief's mind hasn't been removed yet.
The teacher said, "It's true, it's true.
Ru said, "Return my phrase, son.
The monk then paid homage.
The teacher then went to Lingayin and met the monk Sex.
He asked, "How is this the family tradition of Dongshang?
He asked, "What's the family tradition of Dongshang?
"Partial and correct never depart from the original position.
Is the nonarising of anything related to verbal causes and conditions?
The monk said.
"This is a marginal matter for an evening assembly.
How is this an upward statement?'
The nature said, "Don't you see what's practiced among different kinds of people?
The teacher then saluted.
Did Nature say, "Isn't it practicing among different people?
The teacher then smiled and departed.
Neng said, "Perhaps you should stay here and eat tea.
The teacher then went to see the Chan monk at King Yukon.
Chan said, "Where was it that you were near?
The teacher said Lingayin.
Chan said, "Do you still see Zen Master Nity?
The monk raised the preceding remark.
Chan said.
"When there's a series of revolutions, it's not nonexistent.
The old monk often used this technique.
There's someone else who won't do it.
The teacher asked, "Who is that person?
Chan wanted to open his mouth.
The master said, "I've been an outsider for a long time.
Chan didn't feel like spitting out his tongue.
The teacher said, "Would the monk please give us a lesson or two?
Chan said, "I've met few people who know me.
The master said.
"Suddenly, someone asks.
"Monk, how can I just say yes?
Chan remained silent.
The monk then paid homage.
The teacher then went to Gold Mountain and met Monk Qing.

source_sentence: 問曰如何是祖師西來意。
translation: He asked, "How is this the meaning of the patriarch's coming from the west?
Qing said, "This is the meaning of the patriarch's coming from the west.
He said, "Is there another saying?
Qing said, "Don't think falsely.
The monk said, "I'm ashamed.

source_sentence: 青曰少林妙訣何人受傳來。
translation: Qings said, "Who was the recipient of Shaolin's wonderful instructions that were transmitted to him?
The teacher said, "Those who don't fall under the teaching scriptures.
Qing said, "And what do you do?
The master said this is a matter of merit and practice.
Qing said yes, it is.
The teacher said, "Thank you for your answer.
The teacher went to see Monk Ling at Yungai.
Ling said, "Where was it, monk?
He said he was close to Jinshan.
Ling said, "What's the teaching at Gold Mountain?
The master spread his two hands.
Ling said, "What's the message?
The teacher bowed his head and said, "Monks, I don't know the words.
Ling said, "Thank you for answering.
The teacher said.
"Thank you, that's not nothing.
How could it be otherwise?
Ling said, "Will you get that one?
The teacher clarified and departed.
Ling said, "No, it isn't.
He said no. He didn't say anything again.
The teacher went to see Monk Ning at Kaifu.

source_sentence: 問曰如何是父母未生前本來面目。
translation: He asked, "How was this the original face of your parents before they were born?
Ning said, "You're a Chan monk.
The teacher said what's the purpose of that?
Ning said there was a piece of rock under the congregation.
The monk then paid homage.

source_sentence: 寧曰侍者點茶來與尊賓。
translation: Ning said, "Waiter, bring some tea for our honored guest.
The monk then drank in harmony with his voice.
Ning said.
"Why are you using a thief?
You must eat the tea.
The master said, "I've done a disservice.
Ning then returned to the abbot's office.
The teacher then went to see Monk Yi at Daci.
When he saw him, he came and sat facing the wall.
The monk then slapped the attendant three times.
The attendant laughed loudly.

source_sentence: 師曰見與師齊減師半德。
translation: The master said, "I see him on par with the master, minus half of the master's virtue.
He had more wisdom than the teacher before he could impart it.
His question was quite appropriate.
The attendant was speechless.
He looked back the next time.
The master said, "A man with the tail of a dragon and a snake!
The next person said.
"Even though it's like this...
My son discussed it carefully.
The teacher said, "Once you see it, there's no need to see it again.
He said, "It's too coarse.
The teacher said, "Monk, what do you think?
He spoke for a long time.
The teacher pushed him out.

source_sentence: 翌曰三十年來未曾逢如是作家。
translation: He said, "I haven't seen such a writer in thirty years.
The teacher then went to Baizhang and met with Monk Ming.
Ming said.
"This mountain is precipitous and no one has ever been to it.
Why did he get there?

source_sentence: 師曰三千里外知有和尚故來而已。
translation: The teacher said that he knew there was a monk 3,000 miles away, so he just came.

source_sentence: 明曰把茅蓋頭老僧用底。
translation: Ming said, "Put the thatch canopy over the old monk's head and use the bottom.
The teacher said, "I'm afraid he's still hanging his lips and kissing it.
Ming said he was wrong.
The teacher said, "The monk compassionately acknowledged the phrase.
Ming said it was wrong.
The teacher said, "Wrong, wrong!
Ming then returned to the abbot's office.
The master then went out.
Ming then told his attendant.
"It's late today, so stay overnight.
The teacher said, "May I still say one more thing?
He then went out.
The teacher then went to see Monk Tzu in Tiantai.
He said, "Where are you from?
He said, "I'm from Baizhang.
Tzu said, "Thank you for coming from afar.
The teacher said, "What's the matter that's not near or far?
Tzu then shouted.
The teacher said, "Where did it land?
Again, Tzu shouted.
The teacher then shouted.
Tzu said, "This is a very good writer.
The teacher said, "Don't crush him, don't make him look cheap.

source_sentence: 慈曰仰之彌高鑽之彌堅。
translation: Tzu said, "Look up, it's high, drill down, and make it hard.
The teacher said, "Thank you, monk, for approving this.
Tzu said, "That's exactly what I said.
The teacher then went to Wutai to pay homage to Mañjuśrī.
The monastery manager asked him.
"Did you go up to sit there to worship others?
Should he worship himself?
The teacher then paid homage to Mañjuśrī.
The monastery manager laughed loudly.
The monk threw his sitting cloth at his face.
The householder stuck out his tongue and was shocked.
The master said, "I'm not a man.
The monastery master then made obeisance.
The master said, "I'm not a husband!
The monastery owner excused himself.
The master then departed.
The teacher then went to Changmei to pay homage to Samantabhadra.
The monastery master asked where he was from.
He said he was from Wutai.
The abbot asked him, "Tai Gosheng, Tai Gosheng!
The master said, "I dare you to resist the trouble.
The abbot asked him how long he had been practicing.
The master said five years.

source_sentence: 院主曰不關往來是什麼物。
translation: The monastery master said, "It doesn't matter what things have come and gone.
The master struck the monastery master in the face with his palm.
The monastery master smiled.
The monk then stopped.
The teacher then went to Potala Rock to pay homage to Avalokitêśvara.
The abbot asked him where he was near.
He said he was a former visitor to Omei.

source_sentence: 院主曰峨嵋還有普賢麼。
translation: The abbot asked him, "Is there someone at Emei who's a Samantabhadra?
The master said, "With a dignified face?
The monastery manager asked how old he was.

source_sentence: 師曰被院主一問通身汗流。
translation: The master said that he was sweating profusely when the monastery manager asked him.
The monastery master welcomed the teacher back to the monastery and asked him to stay the night.
The master asked him, "Who did the monastery master meet?

source_sentence: 院主曰吾曾見佛果和尚來。
translation: The monastery master said, "I've seen the monk Buddha Fruit before.
The master said that he had personally met with a writer.

source_sentence: 院主曰如何是作家手段。
translation: The monastery master said, "What's the writer's method?
The master then struck the monk.
The monk then paid homage.
The master again struck the monk and told him.
'I've lived on this mountain for 13 years.
I've never met a right teacher.
Today, I've finally met a writer.
The teacher then went to the owner of a hermitage.

source_sentence: 主問曰來來去去作什麼。
translation: The owner asked him, "What's the purpose of coming and going?
The master said he was sticking his nose in the hermitage owner's nostrils.

source_sentence: 主曰老僧鼻孔如何蹈著。
translation: The master said, "How did the old monk get his nostrils rubbed in?
The master then gave him a palm.
The master then shouted.
The master said, "I'm a blind man.
The master said, "I'm ashamed.
The master then asked about it.
The teacher then went to the master of Feng'an.
The master said.

source_sentence: 老僧夢見參洞下大尊宿。
translation: "I dreamt I saw the great honored elder at the bottom of Samantō.
It was just last night at midnight.
It's strange to see the elder monk this morning.
The master said, "Don't originally dream about it in front of a foolish person.
The master said, "Originally look, originally look!
The master then unfolded his two hands.
The master said, "So it is, so it is.
The teacher then went to Master Ying's hermitage.
He asked him, "Why doesn't the monk come out of the world?

source_sentence: 主曰老僧不用出不出邊事。
translation: The master said, "The old monk doesn't need to go out of the world, not to go to the edge.
The master said, "How is the profound path upward?
The master said, "Even a thousand sages can't explain it.
The teacher then paid homage and departed.
The teacher then went to the master of the Meaning Hermitage.

source_sentence: 問曰如何是庵中主人公。
translation: He asked him how he was the master of the hermitage.
The master bowed his head and said, "I'm sitting in the guest seat.
The master said, "Today is the first time I've met a monk.
The master said, "What did you do to come here?
The master said that nothing was coming.
The master said, "This [cut/ear].
The master then rested.
The master said, "Let's go have some tea.
The master then went to the master of the monastery.

source_sentence: 主曰淨慈雲眾久望師來。
translation: The master said, "The Jñānacī clouds have been expecting the master to come for a long time.
They hadn't yet asked the master to come.
The master said, "Why is that?

source_sentence: 主曰長蘆了和尚．天童覺和尚兩員古佛共作證明故。
translation: The master said, "Because the monk Changlu Lüe and the monk Tiantong Jue are two ancient buddhas who testify together.
The master said.
'I've had the two masters' instructions for five years.
I've been walking around without ever having any doubts or attachments.
The master asked the monk to return to Tiantong as soon as possible.
If he does, then he'll attain Pure Compassion," he asked the master.
The master said, "I'll only be a guest at the end of the journey.
The master said, "What about the master's office?
The monk took a long time.
The master said, "It's still the side of my children's children.
The master said, "It's true.
The master then paid homage.

source_sentence: 靈竺淨慈自得禪師錄卷第五
translation: Record of the Chan Master Jingshi Zide, Linzhu, Volume 5
